text:
Hello all! I try to create app to integrate our service with HubSpot.

I want our clients (who have HS accounts) to be able to view/edit their contacts, deals, companies, and other information in HubSpot. There is desirable for the client to be able to authorisation through oAuth2.

Do I need to create a HubSpot app? Or how to make the integration correctly?

Is anybody doing anything clever with React / Headless HubSpot?

Iâ€™m wanting to start to move in to HubSpot CMS development, alot of our clients love HubSpot, but as a developer I want to use modern tooling and React libs such as Gatsby/Next.js

Could anyone shed any light on this and if HubSpot is doing anything with react/headless based code?

Thanks all :slightly_smiling_face: interested to hear any success stories or projects where this has been achieved, if at all? :open_mouth:

Hello, thanks to all. I have a question, do you know how can i create a new HubSpot home page for my company Techedge Group for Techedge Chile? We have home page about Techedge Italia, Usa, Deutch and more... but not for Chile, where I can copy a new lang for Techedge Chile? and what are the points in the code where I have to intervene to make the Techedge Chile home page work? a thousand thanks?

Hey Guys while I was working with font Awesome on a HS Theme , I found out that with font-family:fontawesome it doesn't work , and with font-family:"Font Awesome 5 Free" , font-weight:600 and font-style:normal works so keep it in mind if you have related problems ...
:wave: Hi everyone! I am Robert Zachery, Marketing manager of Email Inspector, an email verification software service: <https://emailinspector.io/>
I am trying to list the  Email Inspector app on the HubSpot marketplace as an integration, but I am facing this:
Does anyone have an idea on how to do this?

I've been writing our integration with our test HubSpot account, it now works perfectly.

I have join gone to deploy it to production and generate an `api key` however it says these are deprecated and to create an application.
I've created an app and got a token such as `pat_xxx` and I am using this
However I am getting errors that it cannot be found.
Im pretty sure permissions are correct.
Are these interchangable with the old API tokens?
Anyone else having issues with the page editor right now?  Not loading at all and eventually getting page unresponsive warnings in chrome

Hi All new to the community and indeed HubSpot as a CRM.

I am looking to understand if it is possible to have HubSpot act as a client and subscribe to an external Kafka topic, then trigger a workflow based on event types?

Has anyone done this to date and if so can you point me in the right direction regarding docs/tutorial to learn this from please?
Thanks ;)
no issues here

Yep probably the cleanest way is to go down the building an app route but you can also just have the client create a private app and share the token with your service. This gets around the need to refresh tokens
Do you mean that you just want the page to translate?
Like from english to spanish?
<@U045E0SFGEN> Nope
They need to be specified in the headers
Authorization: Bearer pat_xxx
Yep you need to just go through the review process
Works for me
Interesting.  Support was able to re-create
It's definitely doable
Does kafka events trigger webhooks?
If so you can setup a serverless function to process the webhooks and then enroll the object that need to updated into the correct workflow
Thanks Carter! Will try
For sure, let me know how it goes
Very interesting
I know that a couple of people were having syntax highlighting issue yesterday maybe HubSpot is just having some issues with the design manager
is there an impact on the live website?
Hi, where can I go to report a possible bug with the Design Tools?
Luckily not really, but still frustrating.
Then just the contact support button
yes, and an href for Techedge Chile
thanks a lot for answer me
For sure stefano
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/pages>
This should help get you going

thanks <@U01QVR44MEY> for your answers kafka generally produces messages on a queue which a subscriber then acts upon, will take a look at a serverless function, if that fails may need to add a microservice to act as a kafka client and push to a HubSpot via api based on kafka events received by the client.
Cool cool let me know how it goes
Hey folks... Is there any way to hack a custom google font into the HubSpot drag and drop email builder?
And yes I know well about the dangers of using custom fonts in email

Yep! I am as well.

Pretty wild how much I take syntax highlighting for granted. So much harder to see things.
Ok, so a change of network, or maybe just timing fixed things
Made the trip to the office and everything is now working as it shoudl
yo <@U01QVR44MEY> you gotta activate Windows :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
I know
I haven't activated in like 2 years
It's sad
Thanks <@U01QVR44MEY> now all I need to do is wait for someone to reply  :watch:
waiting
<@U24GZQ3GF> - you could try this workaround for using the HTML module of the drag and drop editor <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Email-Marketing-Tool/Drag-and-Drop-Email-Font-Options/m-p/251127>
<@U54TVT3C1> what did you do?  Is your syntax highlighting completely back?
So, I never had the syntax highlighting issue
page editor just wouldnâ€™t load.  pinwheeling forever
AAAAAANNNNDDDD the pinwheel is back
dang hahahaa
thank you!

Holy crap. Is HubSpot throwing in the towel and closing? I've never in my life had an "Enterprise" (air quotes intentional) product that is down as often or broken as frequently. It is a DAILY occurrence now that something in HubSpot is broken.

If HubSpot offered SLAs, we'd all be getting their service for free.

â€¢ Workflows - Come build your company on them, add custom code... However on a weekly basis, expect that they will either not work or will be delayed by hours.
â€¢ General access to platform - Oh you wanted your revenue teams to be able to log in? Make sure it's not the day of the week that "HubSpot is currently unavailable for some customers"
What the heck is happening there? Is anybody even aware of just how bad and unreliable HubSpot has become in the last 6 months?!?! Stop building new product and focus on making sure the existing product is stable. It's truly unbelievable.

this is the first time in the last 9 months I've had HubSpot say it was down and actually impact my ability to do what I need to do.

I've seen a few small issues pop up where the conversations inbox was out for less than an hour or some other minor issue, but it doesn't feel that extreme.

As a HubSpot user for over 6 years, I've never experienced the site go down without it coming back up quicker than they could remove the warning.

I have access to nearly 100 accounts and have been working on things in various accounts today without an issue.

It does seem like it impacts customers in different ways and maybe that is why it feels different for some users?

They have had a dozen major system outages in just the last few months. From entire system down to major features down.

Entirely possible you were lucky enough not to have tried to log in or your workflows aren't time sensitive enough to notice.

Perhaps it does impact accounts differently, I spend my entire day in HubSpot, on and off from 5 AM to 9 PM and it has been maybe 2 or 3 times where I couldn't do what I needed.

And yes, our workflows are not time sensitive and I imagine based on your initial comment, that it has a much larger impact on you than on perhaps any other customer.

I was trying to offer another perspective: while the site might be down, it is usually up again fairly quickly.

Yeh I found it, in the end. We are using the Laravel HubSpot package which doesn't out of the box support this but found a work around with out the need to migrate to v4. Annoying you can't just add an API key - stupid on HubSpots behalf..
Same as Jennifer. I've been using HS for like 8 years, can count one hand the amount of issues I've had.
They are deprecating api keys for security reason
Any update?
Lucky y'all.
Similar to Jennifer. I've also used HS for close to seven years now consistently and have yet to deal with consistent major outages.

This is just 1 month of incidents. About half of the outages we see end up on the status page. This is a LOT for an enterprise product. Y'all have low expectations. Heck, *RIGHT NOW* their status page says websites are experiencing degraded performance.

I do remember seeing many of those status updates, what I was trying to say is that only 1 had an impact on my ability to complete work and/or the portals I had access to.

I think they post the messages system-wide, whether they impact 1% or 100% of customers, so they have effectively communicated any potential issue.

If every single one of those impacted you, then I can definitely understand your frustration :dotted_line_face:
Every one plus many that didn't impact enough customers to warrant a status page update.
Anyways, glad it's reliable for most people.
Today has been about the most frustrating day

I havenâ€™t been able to make updates to pages since 6:30am this morning.  To make things more interesting, I was meant to launch a major site update today, but was prevented from doing so because of this issue.
Dealing with support today = Sorry, itâ€™s still broken.
So weird. Must be certain servers, I've been fine all day
<@U012YRGMYDP> theyâ€™re very interested in connecting, will facilitate an email intro

Hello everyone,

Is there someone that can help me to know exactly how I should create contact and company through API so that the company created is detected automatically though HubSpot. Right now I am creating it through domain, but HubSpot is duplicating the companies. How can I solve this issue, what are the best practices/solutions to solve this problem? I need to store in my DB the id of the contact and company that are created on HubSpot on the same action.
